St._Paul.Cyber Village Academy:
Cyber Village Academy is a public charter school in Saint Paul, Minnesota, United States, chartered in 1997. It is located at 768 Hamline Ave S. The school serves students grades Kindergarten through 12.


== History ==
Cyber Village Academy was founded in February 1997 with the charter to serve the needs of students who are in need of some help when it comes to school in the Minneapolis and St.
